title: Greek-Style Roast Potatoes
directions: Heat the oven to 400ºF (200ºC). Combine the bouillon mixture with the lemon juice. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss potatoes with oil, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper. Spread evenly and bake for 20-25 minutes until brown on the bottom.

Loosen potatoes from pan with a thin and flexible metal spatula and turn over. Drizzle lemon mixture over potatoes, toss, and bake 10 to 15 minutes longer, or until the potatoes are cooked through and the liquid has evaporated. Correct the seasoning and serve immediately.
ingredients: 1 chicken bouillon cube dissolved in 1/2 cup (125 mL) hot water
4 tbsp (60 mL) freshly squeezed lemon juice
3 lbs (1.5 kg) russet or Yukon Gold potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch (3.75 cm) chunks
